title: Gulag (1985) - complete with all deleted scenes!
description:
Gulag (1985) - THE COMPLETE FILM WITH ALL OF THE DELETED SCENES!!! FINALLY!!!

This movie is nearly extinct! From what I've read and have been told, it was only shown in it's full form ONCE! This was back in 1985. My parents had just bought their first VCR. I was 6 years old then. This was one of the first films they recorded off of cable TV. It was always one of my favorite films. It was released for sale only once on VHS but they butchered it up. They deleted the now nearly forgotten sewing race, which is one of the best parts of the film.Last year, I rescued the tape from being crush by the weight of the dust which was piling up on it on the shelf and decided I should try to save it somehow. I've gone through many tries with different equipment to rip it to DVD, but none worked since the old magnetic tape had degraded far too much. Now a few hundred dollars and a year later, I obtained the software and equipment to do it right. So as this is a VCR-RIP, the quality is...not quite HD. But it's absolutely, the best I could do. I hope you like it. Please share it with everyone you can and RE-SEED! As far as I know, this might be the only surviving copy of the complete film floating around out there.
